version_description:
HomeAdvisor's Instant Connect feature is now available in the app! With Instant Connect you can connect with a top-rated pro over the phone in under a minute! Arrange appointments and get immediate answers to urgent questions.

We're constantly striving to improve our app and create a satisfying experience. If you have feedback for the team, please reach out by emailing MobileFeedback@HomeAdvisor.com. If you think we're great, please leave us a review on the app store!

HomeAdvisor's Instant Connect feature is now available in the app! With Instant Connect you can connect with a top-rated pro over the phone in under a minute! Arrange appointments and get immediate answers to urgent questions.

We're constantly striving to improve our app and create a satisfying experience. If you have feedback for the team, please reach out by emailing MobileFeedback@HomeAdvisor.com. If you think we're great, please leave us a review on the app store!

We're constantly striving to improve our app and create a satisfying experience. If you have feedback for the team, please reach out by emailing MobileFeedback@HomeAdvisor.com. If you think we're great, please leave us a review on the app store!

We're constantly striving to improve our app and create a satisfying experience. If you have feedback for the team, please reach out by emailing MobileFeedback@HomeAdvisor.com. If you think we're great, please leave us a review on the app store!

Just like our top-rated contractors, our 5-star pre-screened developers have done some great work to build a better experience. They’ve exterminated a few bugs, switched out some bulbs and cleaned up the appearance to improve our already best-in-class app.

Love the app? Leave us a review on the app store!

Have suggestions for improvement? Leave us feedback at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com

Just like our top-rated contractors, our 5-star pre-screened developers have done some great work to build a better experience. They’ve exterminated a few bugs, switched out some bulbs and cleaned up the appearance to improve our already best-in-class app.

Love the app? Leave us a review on the app store!

We've redesigned the Favorite Pros section of the app, making it easier than ever before to reference the pros you love the most, book an appointment with them and share their information with your friends and neighbors.

Love the app? Leave us a review on the app store!
Have suggestions for improvement? Leave us feedback at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com

We’ve brought back one of our users’ favorite features – Instant Connect! For our most popular tasks, homeowners will now have the option to instantly receive a phone call from a top-rated pro to discuss their upcoming project. Get quotes, book appointments and answer questions faster than ever before!

Love the app? Leave us a review on the app store!

Have suggestions for improvement? Leave us feedback at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com

Love the app? Leave us a review on the app store!
Have suggestions for improvement? Leave us feedback at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com

We've redesigned the Projects section, making it easier to stay organized and keep on top of your household projects. We've also made some improvements behind the scenes, ensuring that you will continue to receive a top-rated experience from start to finish.

Love the app? Leave us a review on the App Store!

Have suggestions for improvement? Leave us feedback at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com

We've expanded our network of top-rated pros and have provided additional rating and review information to our consumers so they can hire with more confidence than ever before. In addition, we've added updates to increase the speed, reliability and security of our app.

Love the app? Leave us a review on the App Store!

Have suggestions for improvement? Send us an email at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com

Thanks for using HomeAdvisor! In an effort to bring you the best experience with our network of Home Service Professionals, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

Every update of our HomeAdvisor app includes improvements for speed and reliability. As new features become available, we'll let you know here.

Send pros project photos and messages straight from the app!

Showing pros what they’re working with can help to get you faster, more accurate quotes for your home projects — and new, in-app messaging and photo sharing makes it easier than ever! Simply open a message thread with your matched pro to send notes and project photos right from the app, no calling, emailing or texting required.

Love the app? Leave us a review on the App Store!

Have suggestions for improvement? Send us an email at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com
